member.name: T:QuakeConsole.ConsoleClearFlags
member.summary: Defines which subparts of the to clear.

member.name: F:QuakeConsole.ConsoleClearFlags.None
member.summary: Does not clear anything.

member.name: F:QuakeConsole.ConsoleClearFlags.OutputBuffer
member.summary: Clears the text in the output part of the console.

member.name: F:QuakeConsole.ConsoleClearFlags.InputBuffer
member.summary: Clears the text in the input part of the console and resets Caret position.

member.name: F:QuakeConsole.ConsoleClearFlags.InputHistory
member.summary: Removes any history of user input.

member.name: F:QuakeConsole.ConsoleClearFlags.All
member.summary: Clears everything.

member.name: T:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent
member.summary: Command-line interface with swappable command interpreters.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.IsAcceptingInput
member.summary: Gets if the console is currently reading keyboard input.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.IsVisible
member.summary: Gets if any part of the is visible.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.Interpreter
member.summary: Gets or sets the command interpreter. This defines how user input commands are evaluated and operated on. Optionally provides autocompletion. Pass NULL to use a stub interpreter instead (useful for testing just the shell).

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.LogInput
member.summary: Gets or sets the input command logging delegate. Set this property to log the user input commands to the given delegate. For example WriteLine(String).

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.CharacterMappings
member.summary: Gets or sets the dictionary that is used to map keyboard keys to corresponding symbols shown in the .

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.ActionMappings
member.summary: Gets the dictionary that is used to map keyboard keys to corresponding console actions (such as ExecuteCommand or ToggleUppercase).

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.Font
member.summary: Gets or sets the font used to render console text.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.Padding
member.summary: Gets or sets the padding to apply to the borders of the window. Note that padding will be automatically decreased if the available window area becomes too low.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color. Supports transparency.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.FontColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the font color. Supports transparency.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.TimeToToggleOpenClose
member.summary: Gets or sets the time in seconds it takes to fully open or close the .

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.TimeToTriggerRepeatingInput
member.summary: Gets or sets the time in seconds it takes to trigger repeating input feature. Repeating input is triggered when a key is held down. When repeating input is triggered, keys which are held down will be repeatedly processed or appended to the console (normally they are processed or appended only upon key press).

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.TimeToCooldownRepeatingInput
member.summary: Gets or sets the time in seconds it takes before another character is appended when repeating input is enabled. See TimeToTriggerRepeatingInput for more information.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.NumSymbolsToMoveWhenCaretOutOfView
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of symbols that will be brought into console input view once the user moves the caret out of the visible area.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.HeightRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage of height the window takes in relation to application window height. Value in between [0...1].

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.InputPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the textual symbol(s) that is shown in the beginning of console input line.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.InputPrefixColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color for the input prefix symbol. See InputPrefix for more information.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.CaretSymbol
member.summary: Gets or sets the symbol which is used as the caret. This symbol is used to indicate where the user input will be appended.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.CaretBlinkingInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the time in seconds to toggle caret's visibility.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.RemoveOverflownEntries
member.summary: Gets or sets if rows which run out of the visible area of the console output window should be removed.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.BottomBorderColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the border at the bottom of the console window. Supports transparency.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.BottomBorderThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of the border at the bottom of the console window in pixels. To disable border, set this value less than or equal to zero.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.BackgroundTexture
member.summary: Gets or sets the texture used to render as the console background. Set this to NULL to disable textured background.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.BackgroundTextureTransform
member.summary: Gets or sets the transformation applied to texture coordinates if background texture is set.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.TabSymbol
member.summary: Gets or sets the symbol used to represent a tab.
member.remarks: By default, four spaces are used to simulate a tab since a lot of s don't support the \t char.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.SelectionColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to draw the background of the selected portion of user input.

member.name: M:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.ToggleOpenClose
member.summary: Opens the console windows if it is closed. Closes it if it is opened.

member.name: M:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.Clear(QuakeConsole.ConsoleClearFlags)
member.summary: Clears the subparts of the .

member.name: M:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.Reset
member.summary: Clears the and sets all the settings to their default values.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.Input
member.summary: Gets the input writer of the console.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.ConsoleComponent.Output
member.summary: Gets the output writer of the console.

member.name: T:QuakeConsole.ICommandInterpreter
member.summary: A contract for a command interpreter. Manages command execution and autocompletion features.
member.remarks: Used, for example, to autocomplete user input.

member.name: M:QuakeConsole.ICommandInterpreter.Execute(QuakeConsole.IConsoleOutput,System.String)
member.summary: Executes a command.
member.param: Buffer to append data which is shown to the user.

member.name: M:QuakeConsole.ICommandInterpreter.Autocomplete(QuakeConsole.IConsoleInput,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tries to autocomplete the current user input in the .
member.param: Buffer to read from and autocomplete user input.
Indicator which indicates whether we should move forward or backward with the autocomplete entries.

member.name: T:QuakeConsole.StubCommandInterpreter
member.summary: Provides a stub command interpreter which does nothing.

member.name: M:QuakeConsole.StubCommandInterpreter.Execute(QuakeConsole.IConsoleOutput,System.String)
member.summary: Does nothing.
member.param: Console output buffer to append any output messages.

member.name: M:QuakeConsole.StubCommandInterpreter.Autocomplete(QuakeConsole.IConsoleInput,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Does nothing.
member.param: True if user wants to autocomplete to the next value; false if to the previous value.

member.name: T:QuakeConsole.ConsoleAction
member.summary: An action or modifier (other than symbol input) available in the console.

member.name: T:QuakeConsole.ConsoleActionMap
member.summary: A map specifying which input keys are translated to which s.
member.remarks: is implemented only to allow collection initializer syntax. Iteration will fail!

member.summary: Adds a mapping from keyboard keys to

member.summary: Removes a mapping from keyboard keys to

member.summary: Removes a mapping from keyboard keys to

member.name: T:QuakeConsole.IConsoleInput
member.summary: A contract for the input part of the . Defines properties and methods required to manipulate the input.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.IConsoleInput.LastAutocompleteEntry
member.summary: Gets or sets the last autocomplete entry which was added to the buffer. Note that this value will be set to null whenever anything from the normal input pipeline gets appended here.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.IConsoleInput.CaretIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the caret. This is where user input will be appended.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.IConsoleInput.Length
member.summary: Gets the number of characters currently in the buffer.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.IConsoleInput.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value typed into the buffer.

member.name: M:QuakeConsole.IConsoleInput.Append(System.String)
member.summary: Writes to the .

member.name: M:QuakeConsole.IConsoleInput.Remove(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes symbols from the .
member.param: Index from which to start removing.

member.name: M:QuakeConsole.IConsoleInput.Substring(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a substring of the buffer.
member.param: Number of symbols to include in the substring.

member.name: M:QuakeConsole.IConsoleInput.Substring(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a substring of the buffer.
member.param: Index ta take all the following symbols from.

member.name: M:QuakeConsole.IConsoleInput.Clear
member.summary: Clears the input from the buffer.

member.name: P:QuakeConsole.IConsoleInput.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the symbol at the specified index.

member.name: T:QuakeConsole.ConsoleOutput
member.summary: Output part of the . Command execution info and results will be appended here.

member.summary: Appends a message to the buffer.

member.name: M:QuakeConsole.ConsoleOutput.Clear
member.summary: Clears all the information in the buffer.

member.name: T:QuakeConsole.IConsoleOutput
member.summary: A contract for the output part of the . Defines methods manipulating the output.
member.remarks: Used, for example, to clear the output window or append results from outside the console.

member.summary: Appends a message to the buffer.

member.name: M:QuakeConsole.IConsoleOutput.Clear
member.summary: Clears all the information in the buffer.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.
